programme.title: Return to the Ring
programme.desc: Delivering the untold stories behind some of the most exciting fights in the sport, FIGHT SPORTS brings you 'Return to the Ring'. In this original documentary series, we sit with the participants from some of boxing's most interesting bouts, including the fighters, trainers, officials and promoters that contributed to each event. First, we relive the action from two incredible fights between Light Heavyweights Rocky Gannon and Dominick Carter, who fought in one of the best rounds of boxing throughout the decade of the 1990s. Gannon and Carter, as well as referee Laurence Cole and promoter Les Bonano, give their unique perspective on the fights and all the controversy that followed.

programme.title: XMA
programme.desc: In this episode we follow one of our martial artists as he goes through a grueling tournament and how he uses technology to help him prepare for it.

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles "Sonny" Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock n' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health Follow his journey in this 3-part series, as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds. Directed by Haris Usanovic with appearances by Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Conor McGregor.

programme.title: Fight quest
programme.desc: Episode 7: Mexico City, Mexico - Hosts Jimmy Smith and Doug Anderson learn the Fight Discipline of Boxing and the Martial Art of Hands with Masters Igancio ôNachoö Beristain and Tiburcio Garcia.
